argument.name: Mode
argument.description: The query mode to use. Possible values are:

item.name: "Filter" = Displays the Query by Form screen that allows users to enter filter criteria.
"Order" = Displays the Query by Form screen that allows users to enter sort criteria.

page.description: Switches the Query_by_Form form to either "Filter" or "Order" mode.
page.discussion:
The .QUERY_MODE() method switches a form to the Query by Form mode specified by mode.
Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script is attached to a button. It puts the form into Query by Form mode, then switches to the Order screen.
